passive.name: Chaos Elixir
passive.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>. When the wearer uses their Ultimate, increases DoT dealt by the wearer by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color>, lasting for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s). When a target enemy suffering from DoT imposed by the wearer is defeated, regenerates <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#4[f1]</unbreak></color> Energy for the wearer.
